numberize 1.0.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Generate a number from a numeric vector. Uses digits_from() output to generate the numeric value of the text.

Source: R/numberize.R
number_from.Rd

Generate a number from a numeric vector. Uses digits_from() output to generate the numeric value of the text.

Usage

number_from(digits)

Arguments

digits

A numeric vector translated from words.

Value

A numeric value.

On this page

Developed by Hugo Gruson, Bankole Ahadzie.
